_header: Jesu that died upon a tree
_description: A simple prayer against ‘þe Fendis myȝt’ — one quatrain

BLHar211.Transcription:
Ihesu that deyed vp on a tre Owr sowlys for to wynneSchilde vs from
                    þe ffendis myȝt And fro dedly synne
BLHar211.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
         83 (1965): 35-47: 38.
